actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to congressional disapproval of Presidential pardons.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no pardon granted to an individual by the President under section 2 of article II of the U.S. Constitution shall be effective if two-thirds of each House of the Congress disapproves the granting of the pardon within 90 days of its issuance.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to congressional disapproval of Presidential pardons.
